headline: How Illinois Infrastructure Rate Case And Affordability Push At American Water (AWK) Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: In late January 2026, American Water Works Company’s Illinois American Water subsidiary filed a major rate request with the Illinois Commerce Commission to support approximately US$577 million of water and wastewater system investments from January 2026 through December 2027, including 42 miles of pipeline replacement, facility upgrades, lead service line work and PFAS treatment improvements. The proposal also includes affordability-focused adjustments for low-consumption customers,...
